```
package main

import "fmt"

func main() {
    sum, avg := sum_avg(4, 2)
    fmt.Println(sum)
    fmt.Println(avg)
}

func sum_avg(a, b int) (int, int) {
    sum := a + b
    avg := (a + b) / 2
    return sum, avg
}
```
